roleset.name: surprise, astonished

example.name: shock-v: passivized
example.text: Jaguar was shocked by Mr. Ridley's decision, because management had believed the government wouldn't lift the golden share without consulting the company first.
example.arg: because management had believed the government wouldn't lift the golden share without consulting the company first.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Lately , analysts say , Deutsche Bank has shocked some in the French financial community by indicating it wants a strong bank with a large number of branches .
example.arg: some in the French financial community
by indicating it wants a strong bank with a large number of branches

example.name: shocked-j
example.text: However , after watching the documentary and various other programs and films on Pakistan I am absolutely shocked .
example.arg: after watching the documentary and various other programs and films on Pakistan

example.name: shocked-j: all args
example.text: On that ground it becomes you all to do this person justice; for there is no one who [*] is not shocked at him for the supposed dereliction of the refugees.
example.arg: for the supposed dereliction of the refugees.

example.name: shocking-j: args 0, 2
example.text: Ooooh a chocolate snob. We have one of those in our house too - J is shocking with his chocolate snobbery!

example.name: shock-n: sort of odd arg1
example.text: the fiscal shock of tax cuts

example.name: shock-n: just arg0
example.text: imagine my shock in hearing that Bill Bennet being soundly condemned for gambling .

roleset.note: SHOCK-V NOTES: 'shock' based on financial subcorpus, adjectival 'shocked' based on BOLT-1.Comparison with 'surprise'. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from shock.01-v)
SHOCK-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on shock-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1. (from shock.01-n)
SHOCKED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from shocked.01-j)
SHOCKING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from shocking.01-j)
